Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Island Gateway Holiday Park in Jubilee Pocket, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Airlie Beach Lagoon and Abell Point Marina. This family-friendly caravan park/campground is within close proximity of Bicentennial Park and Cannonvale Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 39 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers, and cribs/infant beds can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. This caravan park/campground also features complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a television in the lobby.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is 10:00 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Island Gateway Holiday Park in Jubilee Pocket, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Airlie Beach Lagoon and Abell Point Marina. This family-friendly caravan park/campground is within close proximity of Bicentennial Park and Cannonvale Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Airlie Beach Lagoon - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Abell Point Marina - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Bicentennial Park - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Cannonvale Beach - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Shute Harbour Jetty - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Great Whitsunday Walk - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Conway National Park - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Daydream Port - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Daydream Reef - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Daydream Beach - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Sandy Bay - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
Cedar Creek Falls - 11.2 km / 6.9 mi
South Molle Island Golf Course - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
South Molle Island Jetty - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Palm Bay - 14.3 km / 8.9 mi

The preferred airport for Island Gateway Holiday Park is Proserpine, QLD (PPP-Whitsunday Coast) - 29.6 km / 18.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
